content: I know of no easy solution, but I'll share two thoughts: - be sure to select to save outgoing messages at settings>composition - to capture those already sent, highlight each message, rightclick 'From' in preview pane and click 'add to addressbook'
creator: davidsk

content: Please understand that thunderbird is only your messenger. If you follow the 'more info' link on the URL you posted, it provides, in French, the instructions from what I presume to be your internet provider, advising to use a different SMTP server. You may need to contact your email provider for more information.
creator: davidsk

content:
Port should be 587. Connection security should be STARTTLS. User name should be the whole e-mail address. Authentication method should be normal password.

And you must use an app-specific password from Apple instead of your regular password. Are you using one?
creator: mozilla98

content: This article should get you started: https://blog.thunderbird.net/2024/08/maximize-your-day-templates-to-the-rescue/ And this addon at https://betterbird.eu/addons/ is outstanding at assisting in writing raw html within the teimplate. I rely heavily on it for any html work.
creator: davidsk

content:
1. Change the default setting to unthreaded for new folders in Settings > Appearance.
  2. Change the of one existing folders in View > Sort by > Unthreaded.
  3. Copy that setting to other existing folders by clicking on the icon on the far right of the column headings in table view and choosing "Copy current view to".
creator: mozilla98
